column4: or, Win2k on one drive, and Ubuntu on the other, or something like that
if he wants Windows ME, it's his call.
sure he can keep it, he can do whatever he wants, but Windows Me i believe stands for Windows MEss  it was by far the most glitchy windows OS in this era
thats what i was thinking.. use 2k for whatever lab work he needs, and ubuntu for every day stuff.
